answers.answer: I had preeclampsia with my last baby. I went in for my check up, urine showed high protein levels, blood pressured was kind of high. I was 39 weeks along, due 5days not dilated. The Dr was concerned, said she wanted to talk to other Dr and get a 2nd opinion. She called me about an hour after I left the office to meet her at the hospital to need induced. They tried a cervadil induction, which is inserted up near your cervix to soften the cervix and progress dilation. It stays in 12 hours. Unfortunately it didn't work for me and I didn't dilate at all. I ended up needing to get a c-section because my blood pressure was getting dangerously high. Everything worked out well though and my little man is healthy and now 8months old

My sister in law had it. She would see spots and her feet got extremely swollen. Her BP was high as well. They had her do the 24 hour pee test and ended up she had protein in her urine. They induced her that next day. She was 37 weeks.
My niece is in perfect health and almost 3 months old now. :)
Thank you guys for answering it really makesme ffeel better I'll just have to wait and see what happens

question: They think I have preeclampsia I have to do this 24hr pee test.  I went in because my doctor said I was showing signs of pre term labor & the labor and delivery doctor said I wasn't and that my baby is fine an iam 2 cm dilated. I'm only 35 weeks an they said it's normal. BUT now they wanna say I may have preeclampsia????  What does it mean or have any of u had it ?? If I have it I may have to be induced
title: preeclampsia
